content: Hello to everyone from HIMSS. Today, Google have announced that they will support the FHiR community by providing Google cloud platform resources to the FHiR foundation. See https://blog.google/topics/google-cloud/google-cloud-himss-engaging-healthcare-and-health-it-community/. These resources will provide web presence, build services, test servers, etc. see podcast I did that mentions this at https://blogs.cerner.com/blog/the-cerner-podcast-grahame-grieve/
I hope that it isn't 'fake news' then
